quests.title: The Missing Merchant
quests.description: Investigate the disappearance of a wealthy merchant from the city
quests.background: A prominent merchant, Alderman Thornhaven, has disappeared from the bustling city of Waterdeep. His family last saw him three days ago when he left for a routine business meeting at the docks. His brother Marcus has been frantically searching for him and has finally turned to adventurers for help.
leads: The merchant was last seen heading towards the docks district
His ledger shows a meeting scheduled with "V.S." at the Salty Dog Tavern
A suspicious payment of 1000 gold pieces was made the day before his disappearance

keyLocations.name: The Salty Dog Tavern
keyLocations.description: A rough establishment near the docks, frequented by sailors and dock workers. The bartender might remember something about the merchant's meeting.

keyLocations.name: Thornhaven Trading Company
keyLocations.description: The merchant's business headquarters. The staff might have noticed something unusual in the days leading up to his disappearance.

keyLocations.name: Warehouse District
keyLocations.description: Several warehouses owned by Thornhaven Trading Company are located here. One of them might hold clues to the merchant's whereabouts.

keyLocations.name: Yawning Portal Inn
keyLocations.description: Famous tavern where information can be gathered.

importantNPCs.name: Marcus Thornhaven
importantNPCs.description: The merchant's brother and acting head of the trading company. He's worried sick about his brother and willing to pay handsomely for his safe return.

importantNPCs.name: City Guard Captain
importantNPCs.description: Has been investigating the disappearance but has made little progress. Willing to share what information the guard has gathered.

complications: The Thieves' Guild might be involved
A rival trading company could be behind the disappearance
The merchant might have uncovered something he wasn't supposed to see
rewards: Potential business opportunities with Thornhaven Trading Company
Possible favor from the City Guard

quests.title: Goblin Troubles
quests.description: Clear out a goblin infestation that's been troubling travelers
